scripts.pub-n: git pull && npm version prerelease && git add . && git commit -m 'updata: update version' &&  npm publish --tag nightly
scripts.pub-a: npm version prerelease && npm publish --tag alpha
scripts.pub-b: npm version prerelease && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.pub-rc: git pull && npm version prerelease && git add . && git commit -m 'updata: update version' &&  npm publish --tag rc
scripts.pub-s: npm version prerelease && npm publish --tag stable
